Jeopardy Question: EVERYDAY ITALIAN - When getting directions, "Segua 
questra strada per tre chilometri" tells you to follow the road this far.
search_results.title: Jeopary Question, EVERYDAY ITALIAN - TriviaBistro.com

question: "Si, Signor Prazzi, fa molto caldo", informs Mr. Prazzi the weather is very this
